where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* pdr.used_representation.items | (i.name='orientation') AND ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.PLACEMENT' IN TYPEOF(i)) )) = 1) )) = 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: (SELF.description <> 'point') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF(pdr.used_representation.items) = 1) )) = 1)

where.label: WR5
where.expression: (SELF.description <> 'circle') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF(pdr.used_representation.items) = 2) )) = 1)

where.label: WR6
where.expression: (SELF.description <> 'rectangle') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF(pdr.used_representation.items) = 3) )) = 1)

where.label: WR7
where.expression: (SELF.description <> 'circle') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* pdr.used_representation.items | (i.name='target diameter') AND (SIZEOF(['GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM','GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT']*TYPEOF(i) ) = 2) )) = 1) )) = 1)

where.label: WR8
where.expression: (SELF.description <> 'line') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* pdr.used_representation.items | (i.name='target length') AND (SIZEOF(['GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM','GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT']*TYPEOF(i) ) = 2) )) = 1) )) = 1)

where.label: WR9
where.expression: (SELF.description <> 'rectangle') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* pdr.used_representation.items | (i.name='target length') AND (SIZEOF(['GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM','GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT']*TYPEOF(i) ) = 2) )) = 1) )) = 1)

where.label: WR10
where.expression: (SELF.description <> 'rectangle') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* get_shape_aspect_property_definition_representations(SELF) | ('GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION_WITH_PARAMETERS' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* pdr.used_representation.items | (i.name='target width') AND (SIZEOF(['GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM', 'GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_MIM.LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT']*TYPEOF(i) ) = 2) )) = 1) )) = 1)
